# Heavy Duty Shredder and Conveyor Belt System Tender

## Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: M4000-3-3685
* Publication Date: April 18, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: May 31, 2023, 13:00:00
* Amendment Number: 4
* Amendment Date: May 31, 2023

## Tender Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires a contractor to supply, deliver, off-load, and install one complete heavy-duty shredder and conveyor belt system at a facility in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia. The deliverables must be received on or before September 30, 2023.

## Pricing Criteria

The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.

## Security Clearance

A security clearance is required.

## Requirements

Refer to the attached tender documents for detailed requirements.

## Documents

Tender documents can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).

## Payment Terms

Canada identifies Indigenous businesses through the Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) and may set aside contracts for Indigenous businesses within the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses.

## Languages

Tenders may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Tender Evaluation

Tenders will be evaluated based on mandatory technical evaluation criteria, and the responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.

## Floor Price Exclusion

There will be a floor price exclusion: no bids will be considered below the price lowest bid received during the tendering process.

## Terms and Conditions

It is the sole responsibility of the bidder to regularly consult the GETS for the most up-to-date information. Canada is not responsible for oversight on the part of the bidder.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact Sandra Bremner at (902) 717-5395 or [sandra.bremner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:sandra.bremner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca).
